min_value_threshold_omega.definition: The lowest acceptable measure of utility efficacy required for state transition finality.
min_value_threshold_omega.calculation_base: Relative system resource utilization optimization (RSRUO) vs. Cost-Benefit Profile (CBP) variance.
min_value_threshold_omega.threshold_determination_logic: Adaptive, dynamically tuned by the Stewardship Layer, subject to formal S05 review.
